channel.title: This is how you make the earth,
channel.description:
mironic, this planet took me 6 mins and 36 seconds with rendering (I timed). If anyone is wondering how I got HD quality in my viewports just ask.
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/sdfsdfsdfsdf.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/earth.jpg[/img]

item.title: This is how you make the earth,
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:6, topic:334749”][quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=431144.msg3165276#msg3165276 date=1269955234]

[quote author=rip4d link=topic=431144.msg3165272#msg3165272 date=1269954851]
Um, commercial? He said cutscene, which would be used in an RSPS, and can’t have textures unless its in the cache, and in this case, it isn’t. So seriously, get over yourself and stop showing off work with no effort.
[/quote]ooh he ment like a cutscene for rsps, pff however, i still prefer mine,
[/quote]I kinda do too lol xD[/quote]lol

Read full topic
item.source: This is how you make the earth,

item.title: This is how you make the earth,
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:2, topic:334749”]In case you didn’t know, textures don’t work with RSPS, and also, it’s a sphere with a texture and nothing more. There may as well be no effort put into this at all. Mironic actually tried something without entire use of textures.[/quote]1. this was not ment for rs 2nd he said he needs something for a commercial i think this eath is a LITTTLE bit better for a comm then his, it doesnt matter either its easy to make or not the point is making it, his needs alot more efford mines a lot more good looking and easier to make if you managed textures ofcourse cus if u don’t then it could take a while but like lets be serious, lets say u have a commercial, as m. said, what would you choose mine or his? dont start about tht mines just a texture bla blabla

Read full topic

item.title: This is how you make the earth,
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

In case you didn’t know, textures don’t work with RSPS, and also, it’s a sphere with a texture and nothing more. There may as well be no effort put into this at all. Mironic actually tried something without entire use of textures.

Read full topic
item.source: This is how you make the earth,
